Title: Seeker's Folly
Description:
I'm sure your pandaren friend has some ideas about what the mogu are after.

He headed up the mountain a few days ago without a guide, and asked that only you be sent up after him. He was very specific:

"The $c must endure the trek alone, with only $ghis:her; thoughts. $gHe:She; will honor each shrine before meeting me at the top."

The path is just northwest of the camp, marked by flags. Please be careful! Seeker's Folly is a dangerous trek even on a lucky day.
ObjectivesText: Brave the path of Seeker's Folly to find Lorewalker Cho, stopping to reflect at the three shrines along the way.
RewardText:
Ah, you made it, and you honored the shrines.

I knew you could handle it.
